snippet.title: Hellpoint Switch Gameplay Trailer | Coming February 25
snippet.description:
Hellpoint is coming to Nintendo Switch on February 25! Pre-order:
Digital edition: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/hellpoint-switch/
Physical edition: https://signatureeditiongames.com/search?type=product&q=hellpoint 

The physical version for PS4 is also coming out on Feb 26, use the link above.

Make sure to follow Cradle Games, the creators of Hellpoint, on the platform of your choice to be updated with the latest news:

Discord: https://discord.gg/hellpoint
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CradleGames
Facebook: https://facebook.com/CradleGames
Instagram: https://instagram.com/CradleGames
Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/Hellpoint

By the way, Hellpoint is already out on other consoles:
PS4: https://bit.ly/2X5LETd
Xbox One: https://bit.ly/2WNRnNl
(runs perfectly on PS5 and Xbox Series at 60 FPS!)

…also available on PC:
Steam: https://bit.ly/2WNRdWf
Epic Games Store: https://bit.ly/2ZUVDN0
GOG: https://bit.ly/2D7o1mc

Hellpoint is an intense action/RPG that takes place on Irid Novo, a derelict space station soaked in an intoxicating dark sci-fi atmosphere. Fight dreadful creatures, face the Cosmic Gods and unravel their twisted story. Should the challenge be too great, play with a friend in local or online co-op!

#Hellpoint #SciFi #ActionRPG #RPG #SoulsLike #indiegame
